name: part_004
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア生誕祭LIVE】遅れてやってきた私の誕生日LIVE！【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [H1vf2vF1LmE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Shiranui Flare and Tsunomaki Watame talk about their previous performance together and choosing the song for today's live.

subtitles.original: わためのライブをしたときにね
subtitles.english: When we did Watame's live...

subtitles.original: あの、私たち二人で歌うっていうの初めてだったの、そのとき。
subtitles.english: that was the first time the two of us sang together.

subtitles.original: そうだね。
subtitles.english: That's right.

subtitles.original: そこで歌ったのがすごい良かったなと思って、相性めっちゃええやんと思って。
subtitles.english: Singing there felt so good, I thought we had amazing chemistry.

subtitles.original: それでまた歌いたいなと思って。
subtitles.english: It made me want to sing with you again.

subtitles.original: ねえ。
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: やる、そのときもね、この曲も、まあ候補に挙がって。
subtitles.english: Actually, even back then, this song was a candidate.

subtitles.original: そうそうそうそうそう。
subtitles.english: Yes, exactly!

subtitles.original: ねえ。
subtitles.english: Right.

subtitles.original: なんか今回、あの、わために声掛けさせてもらうときに
subtitles.english: So this time, when I reached out to Watame...

subtitles.original: いや、どうしてもこの曲、やっぱ候補からちょっと外せないやと思って。
subtitles.english: I felt like I really couldn't leave this song out.

subtitles.original: で、「これ、ちょっとやってみませんか？」って。
subtitles.english: So I asked, "Would you like to try this one?"

subtitles.original: 「やってみましょうよ！」って。
subtitles.english: "Let's do it!"

subtitles.original: そう、わためがね、「やろう！」って言ってくれて。
subtitles.english: Yeah, Watame said, "Let's do it!"

subtitles.original: いや、でもめっちゃ良かったよね。
subtitles.english: But it was really great, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: めっちゃ良かったよね。めっちゃ高かったけどね。
subtitles.english: It was really great. It was very high-pitched, though.

subtitles.original: あ、それな。
subtitles.english: Ah, tell me about it.

subtitles.original: ごめんな。
subtitles.english: Sorry about that.

subtitles.original: でも最後とかさ、元気トークと奥下って感じで、マッチしてたと思わんか？
subtitles.english: But at the end, Genki-talk and Okushita felt like they matched perfectly, don't you think?

subtitles.original: 思わんか？
subtitles.english: Don't you think so?

subtitles.original: みんなも思わんかー！？
subtitles.english: Everyone, don't you think so too!?

subtitles.original: 最後みんなと一緒にさ、撮って終わろう。
subtitles.english: Let's finish by taking a photo with everyone.

subtitles.original: オッケー。
subtitles.english: Okay.

subtitles.original: イエーイ！イエーイ！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay! Yay! Yay!

subtitles.original: ナイトフィーバー！
subtitles.english: Night Fever!

subtitles.original: フゥー！
subtitles.english: Woo!

subtitles.original: はい、ということでね、今日ありがとうございました。
subtitles.english: Alright, thank you so much for today.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました。
subtitles.english: Thank you so much.

subtitles.original: また呼ぶからね。
subtitles.english: I'll call you again.

subtitles.original: 私も呼ぶ。またコラボもしようね。
subtitles.english: I'll call you too. Let's collab again.

subtitles.original: しようしよう。ありがとね。
subtitles.english: Let's do it. Thank you.

subtitles.original: ありがとね！バイバイ！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: 撃ち抜け バンバンバン
subtitles.english: Shoot them down, bang bang bang!

subtitles.original: 待て、生きるか死ぬか
subtitles.english: Wait, it's life or death.

subtitles.original: 突き詰めりゃそれだけ
subtitles.english: That's all it boils down to.

subtitles.original: あとはどうにかなっちゃうもんだって
subtitles.english: The rest will sort itself out somehow.

subtitles.original: 確かに、ほうほう
subtitles.english: True, I see.

subtitles.original: よく聞け、ここじゃ泣き言はいらねえぜ
subtitles.english: Listen up, no whining allowed here.

subtitles.original: 愛情、同情、断捨離の末、感情で
subtitles.english: Love, sympathy, after discarding it all, go with emotion.

subtitles.original: Wow oh, wow oh, dive into the crazy!
subtitles.english: Wow oh, wow oh, dive into the crazy!

subtitles.original: だいぶいい感じ、体に叩き込め
subtitles.english: Feeling pretty good, hammer it into your body.

subtitles.original: Wow oh, wow oh, inside into the crazy!
subtitles.english: Wow oh, wow oh, inside into the crazy!

subtitles.original: なまけるのは百万年早え、はい！
subtitles.english: You're a million years too early to slack off, yes!

subtitles.original: いつでもそう、いつでもそう立ち塞がるのは
subtitles.english: It's always the case, what always stands in your way...

subtitles.original: 覚えておけ、弱い自分だって
subtitles.english: remember this, is your own weak self.

subtitles.original: つまりライフ・フル・イチョウ、掃除してネガティブ
subtitles.english: In short, life full of choices, sweep away the negative.

subtitles.original: 決定的に、撃ち抜け
subtitles.english: Decisively, shoot them down.

subtitles.original: もっとそっと譲れないハートで
subtitles.english: With a heart that won't yield, even more softly.

subtitles.original: 引き金、引きまくれ
subtitles.english: Keep pulling that trigger.

subtitles.original: 言わば完全無双、覚悟ならバッチリで
subtitles.english: In a manner of speaking, completely peerless, perfectly prepared.

subtitles.original: Wow oh yeah, 逃がさねえ、錆びた価値観
subtitles.english: Wow oh yeah, I won't let them escape, those rusted values.

subtitles.original: 官能が唸る、すぐに排除せよ
subtitles.english: Sensuality roars, eliminate them at once.

subtitles.original: 天上天下、我ら独尊！
subtitles.english: Above and below heaven, we alone are honored!

subtitles.original: 右向け左、よいしょ！
subtitles.english: Face right, turn left, yo-ho!

subtitles.original: 左向け左、そう、よいしょ！
subtitles.english: Face left, turn left, yes, yo-ho!

subtitles.original: そのまま進め、よいしょ！
subtitles.english: Keep moving forward, yo-ho!

subtitles.original: 全体、止まれ！
subtitles.english: Company, halt!

subtitles.original: 情報戦・追撃戦・上陸戦・籠城戦、基本だって
subtitles.english: Info war, pursuit, landing, siege; they're all basics.

subtitles.original: なるほど、ふんふん
subtitles.english: I see, uh-huh.

subtitles.original: 必要な素質、それは最上級のIQ
subtitles.english: The necessary quality is top-tier IQ.

subtitles.original: 快楽潜入、監視体制も抜かりねえ
subtitles.english: Pleasurable infiltration, surveillance is flawless.

subtitles.original: Wow oh, wow oh, dive into the crazy!
subtitles.english: Wow oh, wow oh, dive into the crazy!

subtitles.original: だいぶいい感じ、真実を炙り出せ
subtitles.english: Feeling pretty good, smoke out the truth.

subtitles.original: Wow oh, wow oh, inside into the crazy!
subtitles.english: Wow oh, wow oh, inside into the crazy!

subtitles.original: 躍らされるな、躍らせてやってよ
subtitles.english: Don't be danced around, do the dancing yourself.

subtitles.original: いつでもそう、いつでもそう単純なことは
subtitles.english: It's always the case, what's always simple...

subtitles.original: 明かされない、しかしそれが証拠
subtitles.english: remains unrevealed, but that in itself is proof.

subtitles.original: 常にインテリジェンス、磨いて世界を決定的に欺け
subtitles.english: Always hone your intelligence and deceive the world for good.

subtitles.original: もししどろもどろ攪乱、ここで神様
subtitles.english: If you're confused and in disarray, here god...

subtitles.original: Ah, 奪ってみるくらい...
subtitles.english: Ah, I'll even try to snatch it away...

subtitles.original: 官能が唸る、すぐに排除、排除、排除、排除せよ
subtitles.english: Sensuality roars, eliminate them at once, eliminate them!

subtitles.original: 喝采を修得せよ、盾をその手に
subtitles.english: Acquire the applause, shield in your hand.

subtitles.original: 圧倒的な勝利を
subtitles.english: Take overwhelming victory.

subtitles.original: 言わば完全無欠、上機嫌になるまで
subtitles.english: In a manner of speaking, completely flawless, until you're in high spirits.

subtitles.original: 徹底的に顔を鍛えよう
subtitles.english: Let's train your expression thoroughly.

subtitles.original: 己を無力化して無に仕立て変え
subtitles.english: Neutralize yourself and tailor yourself into nothingness.

subtitles.original: 先端、開け、響け、銃声
